name: The North Coat
description: a warm, heavy-duty coat designed to be worn in cold weather conditions.

name: Gucci Duffle Bag
description: bags that are crafted from premium materials such as leather, canvas, or suede.

name: Liquid CPU Cooler
description: a device used to dissipate the heat generated by a central processing unit (CPU) during operation.

name: GP11 Shooter USB Gamepad
description: a wired gaming controller designed for use with PC and PS3 systems.It offers a comfortable and ergonomic design, making it suitable for long gaming sessions.

name: Quilted Satin Jacket
description: a jacket that offer a stylish and practical option for staying warm during the colder months.

name: LCD Monitor
description: LCD monitors have become the dominant display technology due to their numerous advantages. They offer a balance of image quality, energy efficiency, and affordability, making them suitable for a wide range of applications.

name: GamePad
description: a handheld input device used to control video games. It typically consists of buttons, joysticks, triggers, and a d-pad. Gamepads are commonly used with gaming consoles, but they can also be connected to computers for playing PC games.
